Methods

GetNodeValues()

Those are the values that will change the pathfinder grid. Do not change them once the obstacle was added. If the cell values have to be changed the obstacle has to be removed with the orginial values, and can then be added again with the new values

NodeValue[] GetNodeValues()

Returns

NodeValue[]

Events

OnShapeChanged

Invoke this event the shape of the obstacle has changed

event Action<IPathfinderObstacle>? OnShapeChanged
